    TODO: T106084343 deprecate currently existing usage of Component assert.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      <T1,T2> LithoAssertions.LithoComponentAssert hasProps(<any>... propsValuePairs)

    • Method Detail

      • isEquivalentTo

        public LithoAssertions.LithoComponentAssert isEquivalentTo(Component other)
        Assert that given is equivalent to the provided one. This is the same check that will decide if we should skip rerendering of the component again.

      • isEquivalentTo

        public LithoAssertions.LithoComponentAssert isEquivalentTo(Component other,
                                                           boolean shouldCompareCommonProps)
        Assert that given is the same as the provided one including its props. This is the same check that will decide if we should skip remeasuring (if the default should update is not overridden) of the component again.
